name: The Skaters
description:
'''The Skaters''' were an American [[Experimental music|experimental]] music duo based in [[San Diego]] and [[San Francisco]], California, consisting of [[James Ferraro]] and Spencer Clark. The group released [[Cassette tape|cassettes]], [[CD-R]]s, and [[LP record|LPs]] of their work between 2004 and 2008 and toured the United States and Europe until 2009.

Music journalist [[Simon Reynolds]] described the Skaters, along with [[Ariel Pink]], as the "godparents" of [[hypnagogic pop]], and credited a comment made by Ferraro with inspiring the use of the term "hypnagogic".{{Sfn|Reynolds|2011|p=412}}
